languages.text: "Как же это... красиво. Я вижу цвета вашей души, прямо как вы — мои".

traits.locale_text: "Как же это... красиво. Я вижу цвета вашей души, прямо как вы — мои".

languages.text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."
languages.original_text: "Как же это... красиво. Я вижу цвета вашей души, прямо как вы — мои".

traits.locale_text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just like you can see mine."
"This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just like you can see mine."
"This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."
"This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."
"This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."

languages.text: “这真是……太神奇了。我看到了你的灵魂的颜色，正如你看到我的灵魂那样。”
languages.original_text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."

traits.locale_text: “这真是……太神奇了。我看到了你的灵魂的颜色，正如你看到我的灵魂那样。”

languages.text: "Das ist ... hypnotisierend. Ich kann die Farben Eurer Seele sehen, so wie Ihr die meinen."
languages.original_text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ... hypnotisierend. Ich kann die Farben Eurer Seele sehen, so wie Ihr die meinen."

languages.text: « C'est... fascinant. Je vois les couleurs de votre âme, comme vous voyez les miennes. »
languages.original_text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."

traits.locale_text: « C'est... fascinant. Je vois les couleurs de votre âme, comme vous voyez les miennes. »

languages.text: «Esto es... hipnotizante. Puedo ver los colores de su alma, igual que usted puede ver los míos».
languages.original_text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."

traits.locale_text: «Esto es... hipnotizante. Puedo ver los colores de su alma, igual que usted puede ver los míos».

languages.text: 「これは…未了されてしまうな。あなたが私の魂の色を見るように、あなたの魂の色が見える」
languages.original_text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."

traits.locale_text: 「これは…未了されてしまうな。あなたが私の魂の色を見るように、あなたの魂の色が見える」

languages.text: "Gerçekten... Büyüleyici. Ruhunun renklerini görebiliyorum. Tıpkı senin benimkileri görebildiğin gibi."
languages.original_text: "This is... mesmerising. I can see the colours of your soul, just as you can see mine."
